description.en_US: Team had a clearly defined problem that was well researched.

1.en_US: Unclear definition of the problem

2.en_US: Partially clear definition of the problem

3.en_US: Clear definition of the problem

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of research

2.en_US: Partial evidence of research from one or more sources

3.en_US: Clear, detailed research from a variety of sources

description.en_US: Team worked together while creating a project plan and devloping their ideas.

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of an effective project plan

2.en_US: Partial evidence of an effective project plan

3.en_US: Clear evidence of an effective project plan

1.en_US: Minimal evidence that development process involved all team members

2.en_US: Partial evidence that development process involved all team members

3.en_US: Clear evidence that development process involved all team members

description.en_US: Team developed an original idea or built on an existing one with a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

1.en_US: Minimal explanation of innovation in solution

2.en_US: Simple explanation of innovation in solution

3.en_US: Detailed explanation of innovation in solution

1.en_US: Unclear model/drawing that represents the solution

2.en_US: Simple model/drawing that represents the solution

3.en_US: Detailed model/drawing that represents the solution

description.en_US: Team shared their ideas with others, collected feedback, and included improvements to their solution.

1.en_US: Minimal sharing of their solution with others

2.en_US: Solution shared with at least one person/group

3.en_US: Solution shared with multiple people/groups

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of improvements based on feedback

2.en_US: Partial evidence of improvements based on feedback

3.en_US: Clear evidence of improvements based on feedback

description.en_US: Team shared an effective presentation of their solution, its impact on others, and celebrated their team's progress.

1.en_US: Unclear explanation of the solution and its potential impact on others

2.en_US: Partially clear explanation of solution and its potential impact on others

3.en_US: Clear explanation of solution and its potential impact on others

1.en_US: Presentation shows minimal pride or enthusiasm for their work

2.en_US: Presentation shows partial pride or enthusiasm for their work

3.en_US: Presentation clearly shows pride or enthusiasm for their work

description.en_US: Team determined which missions to attempt, explored building and coding resources, and sought guidance as needed.

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of mission strategy

2.en_US: Partial evidence of mission strategy

3.en_US: Clear evidence of mission strategy

1.en_US: Minimal use of building or coding resources

2.en_US: Some use of building or coding resources

3.en_US: Clear use of building or coding resources to support their mission strategy

description.en_US: Team members worked collaboratively on their designs and developed the building and coding skill needed.

1.en_US: Minimal evidence that all team members contributed ideas

2.en_US: Partial evidence that all team members contributed ideas

3.en_US: Clear evidence that all team members contributed ideas

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of building and coding skills in all team members

2.en_US: Partial evidence of building and coding skills in all team members

3.en_US: Clear evidence of building and coding skills in all team members

description.en_US: Team developed original designs or improved on existing ones according to their mission strategy.

1.en_US: Unclear explanation of attachments and their purpose

2.en_US: Simple explanation of attachments and their purpose

3.en_US: Clear explanation of innovative attachments and their purpose

1.en_US: Unclear explanation of code and/or sensor use

2.en_US: Simple explanation of code and/or sensor use

3.en_US: Clear explanation of innovative code and/or sensor use

description.en_US: Team repeatedly tested their robot and code to identify areas for improvement and incorporated the findings into their solution.

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of testing their robot and code

2.en_US: Partial evidence of testing their robot and code

3.en_US: Clear evidence of repeated testing of their robot and code

1.en_US: Minimal evidence of improvements based on testing

2.en_US: Partial evidence of improvements based on testing

3.en_US: Clear evidence of improvements based on testing

description.en_US: Team effectively explained what they learned from the robot design process and celebrated their progress.

1.en_US: Unclear explanation of process and lessons learned

2.en_US: Simple explanation of process and lessons learned

3.en_US: Detailed explanation of process and lessons learned

1.en_US: Team shows minimal pride or enthusiasm for their work

2.en_US: Team shows partial pride or enthusiasm for their work

3.en_US: Team clearly shows pride or enthusiasm for their work
